package.description:
A driver for the laserscanners attached to TASER. The laserscanners are connected to the custom-made RABBIT board from Hannes Bistry via RS-422. This board does some pre-processing and spits out the scandata as UDP packets. Great, because two RS-422 connections would otherwise cause lots of interrupts.
So this driver opens a UDP socket, receives the packets, converts the data and publishes it on the scan-topic in a format like
http://www.ros.org/doc/api/sensor_msgs/html/msg/LaserScan.html
package.author: Ben Adler, adler@informatik.uni-hamburg.de
